creator: mbenson@apache.org
text:
The class description says "This class implements the TaskCOntainer 
interface...".  Apparently TaskContainer was replaced with DynamicConfigurator 
in revision 1.2 of ScriptDefBase.java .

creator: mbenson@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 9643
Suggested patch, simply remove the TaskContainer info...
